Detailed Description

Represents a polygonal face.

Member Data Documentation

DzFacet::m_cageIdx

Cage ids for subdivision surfaces.

DzFacet::m_edges[4]

Array of DzEdge indices for this facet.

DzFacet::m_faceGroupIdx

Face group this face belongs to

DzFacet::m_materialIdx

Material group this face belongs to (limited to 255 material groups per object )

DzFacet::m_normIdx[4]

Array of normals indices to use on this face.

DzFacet::m_uvwIdx[4]

Array of UV indices that make up the face in UV space.

DzFacet::m_vertIdx[4]

Array of vertex indices that make up the face. m_vertIdx[3] will be -1 if this is a triangle.
